ygData.subject: Re: Money issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Killing Sisters of Erroliss(sp?) in the OOT(first stop going to BB on the boat)  is a realy good place to go for money. Load up on purity belts bind yourself
ygData.messageBody:
Killing Sisters of Erroliss(sp?) in the OOT(first stop going to BB on the
boat) is a realy good place to go for money. Load up on purity belts bind
yourself to the docks sell them in Freeport(for 5pp or so), I sold them in
gfay, had better luck selling them to PC's there at 5pp, or just sell them
to NPC's in the Freeport Necro Guild. They sell for about 1pp a peice to the
merchants there, at least for my gnome necro. Those belts funded my FBR!

Hope this helps,
-Araxen 24 Gnome Necro on Tunare

> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
> I am a level 16 necromancer, and I am completely
> broke. As of last night, I am worth 3pp and some
> change. Could you all please give me some ideas on
> getting money? Killing wisps is extremely boring to me
> since they take forever to track down, don't get exp,
> and with my luck I get a non-burned out lightstone
> once out of 10 times. Lavastorm is boring too since
> that is where i spent level 10-12, and dervishes are
> the same story since that was 12-14.
>
> Any ideas, please? :)
>
> Darkmoon 16th circle necromancer.
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
